Category: Makeup Remover

Acid, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Glucosyl Hesperidin, Sodium Levulinate, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Hexylresorcinol, Propanediol, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Extract, Adansonia Digitata Fruit Extract, Myrtus Communis Leaf Extract, Sodium Benzoate
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
